name: BestAphorisms
0:
”Alexa, launch best aphorisms”
”an aphorism”
”give me an aphorism”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best aphorisms
des:
Ask Alexa for new aphorisms.

This Alexa skill delivers the most interesting aphorisms and keep your brain sharp.

HOW TO USE
Before first use, enable the skill by pressing the Enable button in the Skill Store, then say "Alexa, open Best Aphorisms" to begin.

Say "an aphrorism" to hear new aphorism.

To finish, say "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
